contextId.information: These are dried grapes, a small fruit that grows on a vine (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
musical instruments with a head like a drum that can be hit and with pieces of metal around the side that sound when the instruments are shaken (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
These are dried grapes, a small fruit that grows on a vine. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
a wooden sled with rocks or metal fitted underneath, used to separate grain from its stalks by pulling it over wheat placed on the threashing floor. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
This is a type of tree. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
